properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 6:58AM CST until January 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
...A Wintry Mix of Snow, Sleet, and Freezing Rain Possible
overnight and through Wednesday Morning until Noon central...

* WHAT...Snow, sleet, and freezing rain possible with freezing
rain posing minor impacts.

* WHERE...Hempstead and Nevada Counties.

* WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning
commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and sleet this morning will gradually
transition to a snow, sleet, and freezing rain mix by daybreak.
Up to a quarter of an inch of snow along with freezing rain
accumulations less than a tenth of an inch on elevated surfaces
may be possible. Motorists should exercise caution on area
roadways due to the potential of freezing rain.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY
